mapper.select: select FILE_ID as fileId, ORGNM, SAVEDNM, SAVEDPATH from Fileup where FILE_ID=#{fileId}
select BOARD_ID as boardId, MEMBER_EMAIL as email, RDATE, UDATE, COMMENT_ID as commentId, CO_CONTENT as coContent from Comment where BOARD_ID=#{boardId}
select EMAIL, NAME, BIRTH, PHONE, PWD, RDATE, UDATE from Member where EMAIL=#{email}
select COMMENT_COMMENT_ID as commentId, MEMBER_EMAIL as email, RECO_CONTENT as recoContent, RDATE, UDATE, RECOMMENT_ID as recommentId from Recomment where COMMENT_COMMENT_ID=#{commentId}
